scripts.bootstrap: CYPRESS_INSTALL_BINARY=0 lerna exec npm install && lerna run build --scope @aph/web-ui-components --scope @aph/mobile-ui-components --scope @aph/shared-ui-components --scope @aph/universal
scripts.bootstrap:web: CYPRESS_INSTALL_BINARY=0 lerna exec npm install --ignore @aph/mobile* && lerna run build --scope @aph/web-ui-components --scope @aph/shared-ui-components --scope @aph/universal
scripts.bootstrap:mobile: CYPRESS_INSTALL_BINARY=0 lerna exec npm install --ignore @aph/web* && lerna run build --scope @aph/mobile-ui-components --scope @aph/shared-ui-components --scope @aph/universal && bash replace-script.sh
scripts.bootstrap:backend: lerna exec npm install --scope @aph/api --scope @aph/universal && lerna run build --scope @aph/universal
scripts.clean: lerna exec -- rm -rf dist/* && lerna clean
scripts.reset: npm run delete:package-lock && npm run bootstrap:web
